analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/17/0x6ef5bca539a4a01157af842b4823f54f9f7e9968.sol:
	Contract ZeroGold has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/17/0x6ef5bca539a4a01157af842b4823f54f9f7e9968.sol#262)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/17/0x6ef5bca539a4a01157af842b4823f54f9f7e9968.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.23 (/unique_chucks/17/0x6ef5bca539a4a01157af842b4823f54f9f7e9968.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/17/0x6ef5bca539a4a01157af842b4823f54f9f7e9968.sol#93) is not in mixedCase
